title: Best ever gingerbread biscuits
ingredients: ['225g unsalted butter, softened', '300g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons golden syrup', '1 egg', '325g plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '2 egg whites', '1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar', '240g icing sugar']
